title: Repo sync

details: Restructured profile documentation: added intro article, moved content to reference, and created a tutorial.
Updated MODA staging environments to use 'staging' secrets instead of 'production'.
Enhanced billing documentation with license history tracking and internal links.
Fixed content linter to prevent duplicate issue creation.
Enabled text selection in article lists via CSS updates.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
